channel.title: Command NPC talking [Delta]

item.title: Command NPC talking [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Here; (I realised in the first post that you wanted ALL the npcs of that type say something, so I added a quick for each loop)

       if (command.startsWith("npctalk")) {
            String[] args = command.split(" ");
            if (args.length >= 3) {
                int npcToTalk = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
                String temp = "";
                for (int i = 2; i < args.length; i++) {
                    temp += args[i] + " ";
                }
                for (NPC npc : server.npcHandler.npcs) {
                    if (npc == null) {
                        continue;
                    }
                    if (npc.npcType == npcToTalk) {
                        npc.updateRequired = true;
                        npc.textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npc.textUpdate = temp.trim();
                    }
                }
            } else {
                sM("Syntax: ::npctalk <ID> <WORDS>");
            }
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Command NPC talking [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("npctalk")) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int npcToTalk = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); String npcWords = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); String temp = ""; for (int i = 3; i < args.length; i++) { temp += args[i] + " "; } NPC npc = server.npcHandler.npcs[npcToTalk]; npc.updateRequired = true; npc.textUpdateRequired = "+npcWords+"; npc.textUpdate = temp.trim(); } }Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Command NPC talking [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Hint: check this line;

int npcToTalk = Integer.parseInt(args[0]);

After you realise what’s wrong with that line, you’ll also need to edit this one;

for (int i = 1; i < args.length; i++) {

EDIT: I just also noticed that;

if (args.length >= 2) {

Needs setting to 3 as the String will be split into atleast 3 segments if typed correctly.

item.title: Command NPC talking [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill
item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

I know how to make an NPC talk through NPCHandler but I want to make it so there is a command that will let me do something like ::npctalk (id) (words) and make all the npcs of that id say what I input. I’d really appreciate any help, thanks!

Edit: Delta Base, sorry!
and here is what I have in NPCHandler.java currently:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 216) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to RuneCrafting!";}
